hints.content: On the number line, we start at $527$ and move **right** $\redE{3}$, then $\purpleD{70}$, and finally $\blueE{313}$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 527, 530, 600, and 913. An arrow labeled plus 3 is above the number line beginning at 527 and ending at 530. An arrow labeled plus 70 is above the number line beginning at 530 and ending at 600. An arrow labeled plus 313 is above the number line beginning at 600 and ending at 913. !
